7.2 The Transcendentals module

$double-e

Constant

Summary

The value of e, the base of natural logarithms, as a double precision floating point number.

Type

<double-float>

Superclass

<float>

Library

common-extensions

Module

transcendentals

Description

The value of e, the base of natural logarithms, as a double precision floating point number.

See also

See the constant $single-e, page 178.
